text: Guft: «Ej qavmi man, ci megued, agar ʙo man az coniʙi Parvardigoram huccate ʙosad va U maro rizqe neku ato karda ʙosad? Agar sumoro man' mekunam, ʙaroi on nest, ki xud sude ʙiʙaram. To on co, ki ʙitavonam, qasde cuz ʙa saloh ovardanaton nadoram. Tavfiqi man tanho ʙo Xudost. Ba U tavakkal kardaam va ʙa dargohi U ruj meovaram»
